25namespace cppgc {
26namespace internal {
27
28class HeapBase;
29
30// Marking algorithm. Example for a valid call sequence creating the marking
31// phase:
32// 1. StartMarking()
33// 2. AdvanceMarkingWithLimits() [Optional, depending on environment.]
34// 3. EnterAtomicPause()
35// 4. AdvanceMarkingWithLimits()
36// 5. LeaveAtomicPause()
37//
38// Alternatively, FinishMarking combines steps 3.-5.
39class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE MarkerBase {
40 public:
41 class IncrementalMarkingTask;
42
43 enum class WriteBarrierType {
44 kDijkstra,
45 kSteele,
46 };
47
48 // Pauses concurrent marking if running while this scope is active.
49 class PauseConcurrentMarkingScope final {
50 public:
51 explicit PauseConcurrentMarkingScope(MarkerBase&);
52 ~PauseConcurrentMarkingScope();
53
54 private:
55 MarkerBase& marker_;
56 const bool resume_on_exit_;
57 };
58
59 virtual ~MarkerBase();
60
61 MarkerBase(const MarkerBase&) = delete;
62 MarkerBase& operator=(const MarkerBase&) = delete;
63
64 template <typename Class>
65 Class& To() {
66 return *static_cast<Class*>(this);
67 }
68
69 // Signals entering the atomic marking pause. The method
70 // - stops incremental/concurrent marking;
71 // - flushes back any in-construction worklists if needed;
72 // - Updates the MarkingConfig if the stack state has changed;
73 void EnterAtomicPause(StackState);
74
75 // Re-enable concurrent marking assuming it isn't enabled yet in GC cycle.
76 void ReEnableConcurrentMarking();
77
78 // Makes marking progress. A `marked_bytes_limit` of 0 means that the limit
79 // is determined by the internal marking scheduler.
80 //
81 // TODO(chromium:1056170): Remove TimeDelta argument when unified heap no
82 // longer uses it.
83 bool AdvanceMarkingWithLimits(
84 v8::base::TimeDelta = kMaximumIncrementalStepDuration,
85 size_t marked_bytes_limit = 0);
86
87 // Signals leaving the atomic marking pause. This method expects no more
88 // objects to be marked and merely updates marking states if needed.
89 void LeaveAtomicPause();
90
91 // Initialize marking according to the given config. This method will
92 // trigger incremental/concurrent marking if needed.
93 void StartMarking();
94
95 // Combines:
96 // - EnterAtomicPause()
97 // - AdvanceMarkingWithLimits()
98 // - ProcessWeakness()
99 // - LeaveAtomicPause()
100 void FinishMarking(StackState);
101
102 void ProcessWeakness();
103
104 bool JoinConcurrentMarkingIfNeeded();
105 void NotifyConcurrentMarkingOfWorkIfNeeded(cppgc::TaskPriority);
106
107 inline void WriteBarrierForInConstructionObject(HeapObjectHeader&);
108
109 template <WriteBarrierType type>
110 inline void WriteBarrierForObject(HeapObjectHeader&);
111
112 HeapBase& heap() { return heap_; }
113
114 cppgc::Visitor& Visitor() { return visitor(); }
115
116 bool IsMarking() const { return is_marking_; }
117
118 // Returns whether marking is considered ahead of schedule.
119 bool IsAheadOfSchedule() const;
120
121 void SetMainThreadMarkingDisabledForTesting(bool);
122 void WaitForConcurrentMarkingForTesting();
123 void ClearAllWorklistsForTesting();
124 bool IncrementalMarkingStepForTesting(StackState);
125
126 MarkingWorklists& MarkingWorklistsForTesting() { return marking_worklists_; }
127 MutatorMarkingState& MutatorMarkingStateForTesting() {
128 return mutator_marking_state_;
129 }
130
131 protected:
132 class IncrementalMarkingAllocationObserver;
133
134 using IncrementalMarkingTaskHandle = SingleThreadedHandle;
135
136 static constexpr v8::base::TimeDelta kMaximumIncrementalStepDuration =
137 v8::base::TimeDelta::FromMilliseconds(2);
138
139 MarkerBase(HeapBase&, cppgc::Platform*, MarkingConfig);
140
141 virtual cppgc::Visitor& visitor() = 0;
142 virtual ConservativeTracingVisitor& conservative_visitor() = 0;
143 virtual heap::base::StackVisitor& stack_visitor() = 0;
144
145 // Processes the worklists with given deadlines. The deadlines are only
146 // checked every few objects.
147 // - `marked_bytes_deadline`: Only process this many bytes. Ignored for
148 // processing concurrent bailout objects.
149 // - `time_deadline`: Time deadline that is always respected.
150 bool ProcessWorklistsWithDeadline(size_t marked_bytes_deadline,
151 v8::base::TimeTicks time_deadline);
152
153 void VisitRoots(StackState);
154
155 bool VisitCrossThreadPersistentsIfNeeded();
156
157 void MarkNotFullyConstructedObjects();
158
159 void ScheduleIncrementalMarkingTask();
160
161 bool IncrementalMarkingStep(StackState);
162
163 void AdvanceMarkingOnAllocation();
164
165 void HandleNotFullyConstructedObjects();
166
167 HeapBase& heap_;
168 MarkingConfig config_ = MarkingConfig::Default();
169
170 cppgc::Platform* platform_;
171 std::shared_ptr<cppgc::TaskRunner> foreground_task_runner_;
172 IncrementalMarkingTaskHandle incremental_marking_handle_;
173 std::unique_ptr<IncrementalMarkingAllocationObserver>
174 incremental_marking_allocation_observer_;
175
176 MarkingWorklists marking_worklists_;
177 MutatorMarkingState mutator_marking_state_;
178 bool is_marking_{false};
179
180 std::unique_ptr<heap::base::IncrementalMarkingSchedule> schedule_;
181 std::unique_ptr<ConcurrentMarkerBase> concurrent_marker_{nullptr};
182
183 bool main_marking_disabled_for_testing_{false};
184 bool visited_cross_thread_persistents_in_atomic_pause_{false};
185};
186
187class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE Marker final : public MarkerBase {
188 public:
189 Marker(HeapBase&, cppgc::Platform*, MarkingConfig = MarkingConfig::Default());
190
191 protected:
192 cppgc::Visitor& visitor() final { return marking_visitor_; }
193 ConservativeTracingVisitor& conservative_visitor() final {
194 return conservative_marking_visitor_;
195 }
196 heap::base::StackVisitor& stack_visitor() final {
197 return conservative_marking_visitor_;
198 }
199
200 private:
201 MutatorMarkingVisitor marking_visitor_;
202 ConservativeMarkingVisitor conservative_marking_visitor_;
203};
204
205void MarkerBase::WriteBarrierForInConstructionObject(HeapObjectHeader& header) {
206 mutator_marking_state_.not_fully_constructed_worklist()
207 .Push<AccessMode::kAtomic>(&header);
208}
209
210template <MarkerBase::WriteBarrierType type>
211void MarkerBase::WriteBarrierForObject(HeapObjectHeader& header) {
212 switch (type) {
213 case MarkerBase::WriteBarrierType::kDijkstra:
214 mutator_marking_state_.write_barrier_worklist().Push(&header);
215 break;
216 case MarkerBase::WriteBarrierType::kSteele:
217 mutator_marking_state_.retrace_marked_objects_worklist().Push(&header);
218 break;
219 }
220}
221
222} // namespace internal
223} // namespace cppgc
224
225#endif // V8_HEAP_CPPGC_MARKER_H_
